properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 12:18AM CST until January 12 at 8:34PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Yalobusha River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Yalobusha River at Calhoun City
* from Saturday January 11 through this afternoon.
* At 11 PM Saturday the stage was...23.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 23.5 feet today.
* Flood stage is 23.0 feet.
* Forecast to crest near 24.5 feet this morning, then begin a
gradual fall.
At 24.0 feet, Extensive agriculture flooding is occurring. Access to
low-lying areas restricted due to flood waters covering secondary
roads..
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Sunday morning or sooner
if conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
